subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Elton Brand had a season-high 21 points and 10 rebounds, and the host Philadelphia 76ers routed the Sacramento Kings, 112-85, on Tuesday night for their sixth straight victory.
snippet: Elton Brand had a season-high 21 points and 10 rebounds, and the host Philadelphia 76ers routed the Sacramento Kings, 112-85, on Tuesday night for their sixth straight victory.
